snippet.title: Witness what's beyond the DEMO of ShapeHero Factory!
snippet.description:
A little peep at what awaits a little deeper in the "Grimoire" of ShapeHero factory DEMO! An exclusive video from the official!
"Factory x Roguelite x Tower Defense" gives birth to a new sensation of enjoying the "first delicious part of a factory game" over and over to your heart's content!
Coming 2024 on Steam!

Play Now:https://store.steampowered.com/app/2389040/ShapeHero_Factory?utm_source=off&utm_campaign=en&utm_medium=yt&utm_content=gameplay

Discord: https://discord.gg/csDtSpH7BA
Official X:https://x.com/ShapeHero_GLB

#shapehero #indie #gameplay
